The CrawlURI.makeHeritable() method exists in H3 and should work, so I 
don't know what you mean when you say 'is invalid'. Can you be more 
specific about the problem you've run into?

- Gordon @ IA

On 12/27/10 12:51 AM, 郭芸 wrote:
>
>
> Hi all:
> how to add custom persistent key to CrawlURI? I use Heritrix3.0
> I write follow code,but it is invalid
> crawlURI.addPersistentDataMapKey("customPersistnetKey");
> or
> crawlURI.makeHeritable("customPersisitentKey");
> when i use Heritrix1.14.3,crawlURI.makeHeritable("customPersisitentKey")
> can working.
> and how about Heritrix3.0?
> 2010-12-27
